spinfo.tm.extraction.learning

Interface ClassifierStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NaiveBayes

    public interface ClassifierStrategy
    Interface for an unspecified classifier strategy, e.g. Naive Bayes, Rocchio, kNN...
    Author:
    neumannm
